title: CLIENT CRASH PLEASE HELP
body: my game crashes and wont let me reconnect after the champ select count down ends!!!! PLEASEEEEEEEEE HELP

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be issues locally on your network or computer that may be causing a poor connection to our servers. There are specific network settings that could be causing this, so I'd recommend [going over them thoroughly](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't the case.

If you still have issues, let me know.
it still wont work ... what d I need to do??

We'll need to dive into your system logs to continue investigating. I recommend grabbing a set of those logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) before attaching the file it outputs to a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any issues completing those steps.
